comment: Hyperparameter configuration for fast experimentation. Edit these values and restart training.

training.comment: Training configuration - more rounds for better progress tracking and research analysis
training.validation_comment: validation_episodes_ratio: Total validation episodes relative to training episodes. 1.0 = same as training (eps_per_round total), 0.5 = half (eps_per_round/2 total), 0.25 = quarter. Each position gets half of total (both positions tested).
training.target_comment: target_win_rate: Win rate vs ScoreGapMaximizer to achieve. stop_on_target: If true, stop training immediately when target is reached (prevents regression from overtraining).

early_stopping.comment: Early stopping based on loss trends - enables fast detection of bad hyperparameters

regression_detection.comment: Regression detection settings - prevents stopping training too early
